snippet: Marissa Mayer, Yahoo's chief executive, gave birth to a baby boy on Sunday. Ms. Mayer has said she plans to return to work within two weeks and work remotely during her maternity leave. A Yahoo spokeswoman confirmed the birth on Monday morning.
abstract: Marissa Mayer, Yahoo's chief executive, gave birth to a baby boy on Sunday. Ms. Mayer has said she plans to return to work within two weeks and work remotely during her maternity leave. A Yahoo spokeswoman confirmed the birth on Monday morning.

headline.main: Yahoo Chief Marissa Mayer Welcomes New Baby Boy
headline.print_headline: It’s a Boy for Yahoo’s C.E.O., Who Will Continue to Lead
